about.name: Gülin Yardımoğlu
about.title: Creative Thinker Minimalism Lover
about.description: Hi, I’m Gülin. I’m a full-stack developer. If you are looking for a Developer who can craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences, let’s shake hands with me.

projects.title: Minnet Günlüğü
projects.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS and Parcel Bundler and is avaiable as a NPM package and the git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.

footer.text: Let's work together on your next product.

about.name: Gülin Yardımoğlu
about.title: Yaratıcı Düşünür Minimalizm Aşığı
about.description: Merhaba, ben Gülin. Ben bir full-stack geliştiricisiyim. Harika kullanıcı deneyimleriyle sağlam ve ölçeklenebilir ön uç ürünleri üretebilen bir geliştirici arıyorsanız, hadi sizinle el sıkışalım.
